    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Snagging Hook Snare](/Equipment.aspx?ID=705)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Snare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=146" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 256 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 180 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This snare snags a creature with its wicked metal hooks. The first creature to enter the square takes 5d8 piercing damage and 5d8 slashing damage, with a DC 27 basic Reflex save. On a critical failure, the hooks piercing its flesh make the creature [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) until it successfully [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) (DC 27).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
